name: BZ Woodworks
tagline: Well done woodworks, every piece, every time.
description:
Thanks for visiting BZ Woodworks. My name is Jason and this site is a showcase of projects that I have created over the years.

The BZ Woodworks name and logo are inspired by the nautical flags for "Bravo" (B) and "Zulu" (Z), which together signify "well done." This phrase originates from naval communications, where the International Code of Signals (ICS) uses flag signals and phonetic alphabet to convey messages. "Bravo Zulu" became a widely recognized way for naval forces to commend exceptional performance. While continuing my career as a US Navy Officer and crafting woodworks on the side, my goal is to bring the Bravo Zulu spirit of excellence into every woodworking project.

projects.name: Custom School Photo Frame Ornament
projects.description: Preserve cherished school memories with this Custom School Photo Frame Ornament, designed to highlight your child's journey through school! This set includes a laser-cut wooden frame perfectly sized to hold a 2.5" x 3.5" wallet-size photo, along with customizable grade tags and school name.

projects.name: Pegsies Wooden Peg Dolls
projects.description: In 2020, with two young daughters and an unexpected amount of free time, our family decided to create a wood based creative and playful doll option. We saw so many toys on the market that simply wasted a regrettable amount of plastic and felt we had some ideas to offer. Pegsies, as its own brand and company, has grown over the years found its way into homes, schools, and churches in all 50 states and more than 10 countries.
